name: Wang Feng
description: Mainland China rock singer，music composer，lyricist，composer，initiator of the band 43 Baojia Street.
magnum opus: 《The Storm》《Fireworks》《Love is a Happy Bullet》《Life in Bloom》《Braveheart》《Faith In the Air》

name: Zheng Jun
description: Famous Chinese rock singer and original musician.
magnum opus: 《Naked》《The Third Eye》《In full bloom》《Back to Lhasa》《Dao》《Flying low》

name: Cui Jian
description: Chinese rock and roll singer，songwriter，director，actor and screenwriter，known as the father of Chinese rock and roll.
magnum opus: 《The prodigal son returns》《Nothing》《The new long March road rock》《quick let me sprinkle some wild on the snow》《who is Cui Jian》

name: Huang Jiaju
description: Hong Kong, China male singer, original musician, guitarist, lead singer and member of the rock band Beyond.

name: Dou Wei
description: Chinese rock singer and musician. He joined Black Panther in 1988 as lead singer and songwriter.

name: Xu Wei
magnum opus: 《Elsewhere》《The Year》《Time For a Walk》《The Gift》《The Third Pole》
